attributes.action: extend the life sentence to full life imprisonment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: there are people in the uk that have been given life sentences, and a few years later being let out for good behavior, if they get a life sentence they should spend the rest of their lives in prison, it is wrong to let them out early because of 'overcrowding'and 'good behavior', they got the sentence because of what they did, and they should have to pay the consequences.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
